title: The Good Place
synopsis: Due to an error, self-absorbed Eleanor Shellstrop arrives at the Good Place after her death. Determined to stay, she tries to become a better person.
cast: Kristen Bell, Ted Danson, William Jackson Harper

episodes.title: Everything Is Fine
episodes.synopsis: When Eleanor dies and winds up in an afterlife paradise reserved for only the most ethical people, she realizes she's been mistaken for somebody else.

episodes.title: Flying
episodes.synopsis: Eleanor wants Chidi to teach her to be a good person, so he insists that she participate in a neighborhood cleanup instead of learning to fly.

episodes.title: Tahani Al-Jamil
episodes.synopsis: Eleanor thinks Tahani knows her secret. Michael tries to get Chidi interested in a new hobby. Janet goes through some strange personality changes.

episodes.title: Jason Mendoza
episodes.synopsis: Eleanor becomes friends with another neighborhood resident who's hiding something. Tahani plans a gala for the opening of a new restaurant.

episodes.title: Category 55 Emergency Doomsday Crisis
episodes.synopsis: Chidi tires of spending so much time teaching Eleanor. Tahani snoops and doesn't like what she finds. Michael quarantines the neighborhood.

episodes.title: What We Owe to Each Other
episodes.synopsis: Eleanor distracts Michael from his search for the design flaw that's disrupting the neighborhood. Chidi horns in on Tahani and Jianyu's spa date.

episodes.title: The Eternal Shriek
episodes.synopsis: After learning Michael's retirement will be an eternity of torture, Eleanor decides to deactivate Janet, the only one able to send Michael away.

episodes.title: Most Improved Player
episodes.synopsis: Trying to uncover the truth, Michael interrogates Eleanor about her life, and also interviews Chidi, Tahani and Jianyu. Chidi faces a moral dilemma.

episodes.title: ...Someone Like Me as a Member
episodes.synopsis: Michael has difficulty negotiating for Eleanor's fate. The Bad Place demons misbehave at Tahani's house. Chidi bonds with the other Eleanor.

episodes.title: Chidi's Choice
episodes.synopsis: Michael is frustrated by Chidi's indecisiveness. Eleanor discovers feelings she didn't realize she had. Jianyu makes a surprising announcement.

episodes.title: What's My Motivation
episodes.synopsis: Eleanor tries to improve her score before the judge arrives. Michael makes a surprising discovery. Chidi asks Eleanor for advice about love.

episodes.title: Mindy St. Claire
episodes.synopsis: Eleanor flees to the Medium Place with Jason and Janet, where they meet a former lawyer who lives there alone. Meanwhile, Eleanor's trial proceeds.

episodes.title: Michael's Gambit
episodes.synopsis: Eleanor, Jason, Chidi and Tahani argue about which two of them should go to the Bad Place. Eleanor has a shocking realization about the Good Place.
